title: How to Get Free Instagram Followers in One Day

steps.title: Make sure your account is private.
steps.content: Make sure your account is private. (A private account is proven to attract more people since they would want to look at your photos)

steps.title: Go to a famous Instagram user/friend and check their "followers" tab.
steps.content: Go to a famous Instagram user/friend and check their "followers" tab.

steps.title: The list of followers is shown.
steps.content: The list of followers is shown. Follow/request people who have more "following" than "followers"

steps.title: After one day, check your notifications!
steps.content: After one day, check your notifications! It should say "________wants to follow you. "

steps.title: Now, press the user(s) that wants to follow you and press the green "✓" button to confirm their request.
steps.content: Now, press the user(s) that wants to follow you and press the green "✓" button to confirm their request . Do it to every follower that requested and wants to follow you.

steps.title: Do steps 2-6 everyday for everyday followers.
steps.content: Do steps 2-6 everyday for everyday followers. You will receive about 20-50 followers a day if you follow a lot of people.

steps.title: After 3 weeks, download any kind of free app which lets you see who unfollows you, fans, mutual friends, non-followers, etc.
steps.content: After 3 weeks, download any kind of free app which lets you see who unfollows you, fans, mutual friends, non-followers, etc. A good choice is Instafollowers.

steps.title: Go to "non-followers" and unfollow all of your non-followers.
steps.content: Go to "non-followers" and unfollow all of your non-followers.

steps.title: Then, go to your "following" at Instagram and unfollow unimportant people/strangers that you follow.
steps.content: Then, go to your "following" at Instagram and unfollow unimportant people/strangers that you follow. Unfollow a lot.

steps.title: Repeat steps 2-10 every four weeks until you're into-famous.
steps.content: Repeat steps 2-10 every four weeks until you're into-famous.
